text: The 2018–19 Men's England Hockey League season was the 2018-19 season of England's field hockey league structure. The season started on 22 September 2018 until 14 April, with a winter break in December and January for the Indoor season. Surbiton topped the regular season table but Hampstead and Westminster sealed the Championship after winning the play offs.
